de.systemagmbh.tools.io
Class CSysFileFinderZip

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.io.CSysFileFinderZip
public final class CSysFileFinderZip
extends Object

This class allows the search for files within Jar and Zip archives.

IMPORTANT
Jar and Zip files are internally sorted alphabetically, considering path and filename together. So be aware what you will get when you search for files that appear multiple times with different path but same filename.

Here is an example that figures the issue. Below you will see an fragment of a Zip file ordered like described:
...
de/systemagmbh/sample.txt
de/systemagmbh/text.txt
sample.txt
text.txt
...
 If you search for sample.txt the first entry you will get is de/systemagmbh/sample.txt and NOT sample.txt.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $
Author:
Christian Wohanka

Search for the first occurrence of a file within a archive starting from a specified folder including subfolders or not.

Parameters:

zipFile - abstract path name String pointing to the zip file to search.
startFolder - folder within the zip file to start the search
searchSubfolders - flag indicating whether subfolders should be included or not.

the first found ZipEntry or null.

Search for all occurrences of a file within a archive.

Parameters:

zipFile - abstract path name String pointing to the zip file to search.
Returns:
array of ZipEntries. If no file was found the array is empty.
